sql.if: AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SPRING_BOARDS (ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITEDATE, fileName) VALUES (AUTO_INCREMENT.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{fileName})
mapper.select:
SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITEDATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ID DESC) NO, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITEDATE FROM SPRING_BOARDS WHERE 1=1
) WHERE NO > #{pageStart} AND NO <= #{pageStart} + #{perPageNum}
SELECT B.*, U.NAME, U.IMG, U.U_LEVEL FROM SPRING_BOARDS B, SPRING_USERS U WHERE ID = #{id} AND U.USERID = B.WRITER
